export const AboutPage = () => { return ( <> {/* Page Header */}

About Us

somethings worth knowing about

{/* Our Vision Section */}

Our Vision

We envision a future where all students can easily access fitness facilities and resources they need to stay healthy and active, regardless of their financial situation. FITBITFUSION aims to partner with a range of fitness providers to expand this access and foster a community of motivated, healthy students.

{/* Our Story Section */}

Our Story

FITBITFUSION was founded by a group of fitness enthusiasts who struggled to maintain a fitness routine as students due to high costs and lack of affordable options. Recognizing this gap, we set out to create a platform that connects students with quality fitness resources and exclusive discounts, helping them make fitness a sustainable part of their lives.

); }
